itemCount: {{PLURAL:$1 Item}} ii description ke match kare hai.
browse: Nai to, following classes ke browse karo:
noFiltersDefined: Ii class ke koi filter defined nai hai.
noItems: Ii  description ke koi item nai match kare hai.
displayItemsError: Item ke suchi ke dekhae ke try kare me kuchh jaada time lagaa; meharbaani kar ke aur filter ke jorro.
gettingValues: Filter $1 ke khatir value laawa jaaawe hai...
noAdditionalValues: Filter $1 ke khatir aur value nai hai.
filterError: Filter $1 ke value laae me bahut time lagaa.
filterTimeout: Filter $1 ke puura value laae me bahut jaada time lagaa; ii khatir hian ek possibly incomplete set hai.
selectValue: $1 ke khatir ek value select karo:
selectAdditionalValue: $1 ke khatir ek aur value ke select karo:
changeClassNote: (Note karo: agar aap class ke badaltaa hai, tab aap abhi ke filter ke lose kar degaa.)
specificClass: Ek aur specific class me badlo:
generalClass: Ek aur jaada general class me badlo:
chooseLinkedFilter: Ii sab classes me se ek filter ke choose karo:
